description: A Node.js command-line application. It takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generate an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.
title: Team-Profile-Generator

description: This is an app that generated a professional Github README file for any project. It will take user's input and create a quality README file with sections like: title, description, license, installation, usage, testing, and questions. This README file was created with this app, however manual changes have been added. Please see the generatedReadMe.md file, to see what to see a sample file, generated with this app.
title: Readme Generatie

description: Forcast app using OpenWeather API. The App allows the user to enter a city name & display the weather forecast for today and the next 5 days.
title: Weather-Forecast-App
